channel.title: [Rune-Evo] Old Godswords? Please Help!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm currently trying to re-write Rune-Evo v3 completely. I want to make a unique server and then in time release it with credits to all who help with certain things! I'm looking to pack the looks of the "old" godswords into the server, I just can't stand the looks of the new godswords and I'm sure others would prefer the old look anyways :P Maybe, quite possibly, if it's possible lol I would rather have it to be interchangable to where players can type ::oldlook or ::newlook. If anyone can help me, message me here and I'll reply with my skype name if needed.
Thanks for your time. Sincerely yours,
~Vladamor(Sillydiablo)

item.title: [Rune-Evo] Old Godswords? Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

You’d have to change weapon animations in a lower revision.

Read full topic
